Reviews.Title: Using in Brazil - Wonderful but bigger than I thought
Reviews.Author: Daniela C. Matielo
Reviews.Content: Well, I have been dreaming to buy one of this for quite a while: researched, compared, did a lot of pros and cons and finally decided I would go for the Galaxy Tab. What made take the decision was: the outside design - I thought about buy Asus transformer but reviews said it was not so elegant. I was considering buying it also because of the extra battery keyboard, but friends conviced me that I would hardly need more than 9 hours of working on it. Also, I wanted a 3G gadget, which this one does wonderfully.There are a lot of interesting applications in the market and I am quite content with it, overall. But I must say that 1) It actually could be a bit smaller: it is bigger than a book, and that makes it difficult to hold while eating, for example (ok, you may say it is not healthy to read while having lunch, but then again, this is my review ;). 2) I do miss having more battery. Because sometimes I forget to charge it at night and find myself without battery during the day.I am happy I bought it 3G though - I was afraid it wouldn't work with a normal SIM card but it actually worked pretty well, just out of the box. And because there are several places here that you don't have wi-fi, it is useful to have a tablet that can connect to internet no matter where you are. I did not give it 5 stars because of my own frustation and not because of the tablet. Hope this is useful.

Reviews.Title: Comparing to iPad and using it in Brasil...
Reviews.Author: Flavio Levi Moreira
Reviews.Content: I won't go over the details that everyone knows... tech Specs, design, etc...SYNC WITH THE GALAXY S and COMPUTER:I have a GalaxyS Smartphone. Once I took the SGT out of the the box, I just needed to login on my market account and the SGT donwloaded all the apps available for the TAB.When I connected it with my laptop, I just manage the files in it as if it was a Storage device. Added music, books, pics, and the SGT did the rest of the job organizing the files in its programs.TOUCH:The system and the touchscreen response are sometimes slower then the iPAD, but the fact that you can customize the screens and that you have lots of shortcuts gives you a more efficient handling of the device.WORKING WITH IT:I've oppened office documents on the POLARIS (come along and free software) and edited some excel files. Works great.I also visited lots of website, with full acces to all it content (java and flash).I Recommend the Tab for those who like to customize, use widgets and shortcuts... If you want a simple to use (but limited device), go for an iPAD.

Reviews.Title: Beware Worldwide Distributing!!
Reviews.Author: lgn135
Reviews.Content: This tab was purchases as a Christmas gift through Amazon and arrived quickly with their usual great customer service. HOWEVER, upon opening it on Christmas Day we found that the user's manual (and the tab) were in Spanish - which I am not fluent in. We were able to switch to English but upon taking the tab to AT&T; for activation, they were unable to connect it.I called  Worldwide and they said to call Samsung, it was not their problem. Upon calling Samsung I learned that the 7500 is an INTERNATIONAL tablet sold in India and tha I would have to call India's customer service as the US only helps with the 7510. Upon calling Worldwide again and expressing my dissatisfaction (and, no, they won't accept returns because it has been opened - uhh, how else do you use it???) they said that I was correct that it was not expressly listed as an international tablet on the Amazon website but that I should have researched it further and made sure that I was buying a US model (7510) not the international model (7500).Thanks Worldwide - you've been a great help! I now own a very expensive international wi-fi only, pretend 3g tab.

Reviews.Title: A lot of good in a small device
Reviews.Author: vinokurov
Reviews.Content: Pros: Readable screen, fast internet, glider - a huge choice,documents - reading and editing, Superb gps, long battery, free of use (Jobs-free), light, thin!Cons: retarding scrolling menu,not included USB connector in the package

Reviews.Title: Buyers beware
Reviews.Author: R 22 Jim
Reviews.Content: I just purchased 1 of these Galaxy Tabs GT-P7500 and have spent several hours on the phone trying to activate it on the ATT network, they were very supportive, however even with ATT calling Samsung to try and resolve the connection problems, Samsung told them it would not work. This should not be sold to US buyers thinking that they can use the 3G, when in fact it would take a Rooting process, which would delete the warranty

Reviews.Title: buyer beware
Reviews.Author: GJT
Reviews.Content: This product is NOT U.S. made, which causes problems if you need service. Also, because this tablet model can send and receive telephone calls, its IEMI identification is as a smart phone not just a tablet. Therefore you cannot purchase just a data plan for it. You must purchase telephone minutes plus a data plan. If I had know this, I would not have purchased this model.

Reviews.Title: Polished hardware, buggy OS, limited tech support
Reviews.Author: Luiz Ramos
Reviews.Content: The tablet looks nice and has a big display. The hardware is polished but the operating system is very limited and buggy.Critically bad: I bought the Galaxy tab and used it for a year in the US. I moved to Brazil and the tablet started showing the well-known "oil slick"/"newton ring" problem. After 3 months, the motherboard became defective (similar to this problem: [...]) and it cannot be replaced by Samsung Brazil. In the US, service without warranty charges almost the price of a new tablet (not counting the replacement part costs). Additionally, Android Honeycomb was always buggy (especially the email/text-writing tools). I'm really disappointed in this tablet and in the Samsung service.

Reviews.Title: Decent tablet, I believe the newer tab 2 should be better
Reviews.Author: Somedude "Computer consultants Boston"
Reviews.Content: I own both this Samsung tab 10.1 running honeycomb and an Apple ipad 3 and a Dell streak 7. In all fairness the Ipad3 is a third generation product where as the Galaxy is a first generation tablet from Samsung. But the biggest quirk especially with the honey comb operating system is the responsiveness ... it lags at times even when switching screens on the home screen. It just does not feel as fluid as the ipad 3. I believe they corrected this with the new tab 2 (when I tried it out in the store)My personal recommendation is to buy the new tab 2 instead of this one. Even though the price maybe a bit lower, you will be pulling your hair out especially if you are used to the fluid touch screen responsiveness of an ipad. The new tab definitely improves on this one point (I believe the new operating system has to do with this, not just hardware alone)

Reviews.Title: Value for Money
Reviews.Author: Muruga Hari
Reviews.Content: I purchased this Tablet for my Uncle who lives in India. He wanted this particular model because this one has slot for SIM card to get internet where wi-fi is not available. He said it is working great and Android makes him to load lot of Apps and he is completely satisfied with this tablet. I ordered this tablet thru Amazon and it came at the right time with very professional packaging. In fact it had a extra plug to use for 230V International socket. Good Value for Money.

Reviews.Title: Soumik Karmakar
Reviews.Author: Smk
Reviews.Content: Never buy unlocked devices in the US. All around there is apathy for unlocked devices. I purchased an unlocked GT-P7500 from Amazon.com and here are the lessons I learnt --1.If you call up any US GSM cellular provider to ask for sim for the unlocked tablet it would be very difficult to convince them about what you want. They do not know the world outside their locked/contract devices.2. You do not get to update to the latest version of Android for unlocked versions.3. The device may not be hard wired/ hard coded to make it appear as a US device. The location is hard wired in the device and they is no setting in an Android device to change the location. You will not be able to install apps like Google music and Netflix which can only be installed for devices for which the location is hard wired to US. Thus gone are my plans to listen to my music collection on Google music and watching movies at bed time on Netflix.

Reviews.Title: excelent
Reviews.Author: nestor
Reviews.Content: It is a very fine product and excelent, it's fast for navegate at the web,very ease to handle and ligth. The aplication in the android so greate

Reviews.Title: Fine, but not what was advertised or ordered
Reviews.Author: D. Zar "dzar69"
Reviews.Content: This item is clearly described at being a GT-7500 Wi-Fi, 3G 16 GB model. That's not what I received; I have a 32GB Wi-Fi only model. Beware of Warehouse Deals. I paid for overnight shipping as I needed this for the weekend and now I don't have what I needed. Phooey on them and phooey on Amazon for not doing better with shipping the correct product (this was fulfilled via Amazon Prime so I blame them, too).In the end, product seems fine, but not what was advertised so I'm stuck without what I needed.

Reviews.Title: New Really? Then why was it rooted to another computer?
Reviews.Author: Cinergywifi
Reviews.Content: I bought this item as new, according to the ad on Amazon. When the device wasnt loading programs correctly I did some research. It was rooted to a Dell in Decemeber 2011. It was also not a US version. According to the serial numbers it is either Europe or South Africa. I paid $629.00 for this device, and it is worthless now. It was rooted and cant get the latest updates, Samsung wont let me register it, and the seller was completely misleading on the ad. I think Amazon should remove them from being a vendor immediatley! This is the problem with buying things from Amazon.Jared

Reviews.Title: Not compatible with AT&T;, only T-mobile
Reviews.Author: Zoya Kovenya
Reviews.Content: Good quality, had a wi-fi version before decided to upgrade for 3G.Not compatible with AT&T;, only T-mobile. Flash doesn't work.

Reviews.Title: Super nice item
Reviews.Author: Mario
Reviews.Content: the Samsung Galaxy Tab 10 is a great investment it also makes the perfect gift for work or school it is a super nice purchase

Reviews.Title: Samsung is the best
Reviews.Author: Damany
Reviews.Content: no problems what so ever with this tablet, it does as expected. I just think google play apps can be much better. very good tablet for anyone to have.

Reviews.Title: I had trouble with customs in china, but at the end all was ok.
Reviews.Author: dc6rd
Reviews.Content: Maybe next time, I would try to avoid trouble with customs.But the device arrived well, only it tooks some time.

Reviews.Title: Muy Bueno
Reviews.Author: Pedro Santander
Reviews.Content: Herramienta muy útil, ligero, facil de transportar , muy rapida conexión. muy satisfecho con la compra realizada. Lo único negativo es que se consume muy rapido la bateria

Reviews.Title: Me encanta
Reviews.Author: Luz Zaida Palma Piñero
Reviews.Content: una excelente opcion de compras, para hacer un buen regalo, y la esperiencia con la compra fue lo maximo, rapido y sin complicaciones....

Reviews.Title: Le faltan aplicaciones
Reviews.Author: Jessica
Reviews.Content: La tablet no trae Play Store, tengo que llevarla a que se lo instalen. No me parece que esto deba suceder, en general la tablet es bien pero le falta una de las cosas mas importantes. Creo que eso lo deberían de especificar. Ahora tengo que perder tiempo y dinero para solucionar eso.The tablet does not bring Play Store, I have to take to install it. I do not think this should happen, the tablet is generally good but lacks one of the most important things. I think that you should specify. Now I have to spend time and money to fix it.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: JazminJC
Reviews.Content: Great product, delivered on time in great condition. I purchased this tablet as a gift to myself and it far exceeds my expectations.

Reviews.Title: Great Tablet
Reviews.Author: Marylu
Reviews.Content: This tablet is perfect, it is working really good.  I love it,  fast internet, good access for widgets, conection with the laptop is excellent, sincronized with my contacts and phone,  transfers files and music and videos is easy by bluetooth.  I recommend this tablet.

Reviews.Title: I loved
Reviews.Author: Margarida P Braga
Reviews.Content: I'm loving it, is very good.All the site as described, delivery, responsiveness, product ... note 10The cover is also great.

Reviews.Title: BEST TABLET ON THE MARKET
Reviews.Author: awesomeness
Reviews.Content: I really hate all hose people writing reviews on how bad the service is or how amazon messed stuff up. DO YOUR RESEARCH!!!!!!! When buying technology you should at least have some background info on it what it does and what all those numbers and letters mean. Yes this is the international version. Personally I think this one is better than the tab 2 because the camera is better and a couple of other reasons. I did not buy my tablet from amazon but I am sooooooo pleased with this product. I would never regret it. It is better than the I pad. I feel sorry for those technology idiots who don't get this. Even a 14 year old  would know to do their research.BOTTOM LINE: IF YOU ARE LOOKING FOR THE TABLET GET THE GALAXY TAB. IT IS THE BEST TABLET EVER. IF YOUHAVE PROBLEMS WITH THE SERVICE TELL AMAZON NOT WRITE A BAD REVIEW FOR THE PRODUCT. THE PRODUCT ITSELFIS PHENOMENAL. ITS THOSE TECHNOLOGY IDIOTS WHO RUIN THE RATINGS OF GREAT PRODUCTS.

Reviews.Title: ordered this Tablet twice from the same supplier- Warehouse Deals Inc but got a small multi adapter instead
Reviews.Author: ANIL VALABJEE
Reviews.Content: Ordered the Samsung Tablet Twice from the Amazon website - 3rd party supplier, namely WAREHOUSE DEALS INC, but in both cases instead of receiving the actual tablet, i received a small multi adaper but still was charged USD 400 or so for it. To my dismay, i had in both instances called Amazon and complained.  Thanks to Amazon was given a full refund for the purchase, but a word of advise, please avoid purchasing from WAREHOUSE DEALS INC as they are not reliable supplier.

Reviews.Title: dont waste your money on this
Reviews.Author: Lori A. Mcdaniel
Reviews.Content: i wish i hadnt. some of the game apps work, some dont. sometimes it works on facebook and ebay and other web sites, sometimes not. i just lost a really, really important auction because it simply would not work when i needed it to. and i was the only one bidding! im so tird of fighting with this thing. i guess its just good for reading. might as well get a kindle. this is just a high priced piece of crap.

Reviews.Title: miss understud wit unlock 3g
Reviews.Author: dewa
Reviews.Content: just got it,but feel bad bcouse cant use my sim card on it, i mist understennd with the statement unlock 3g,, but its goodi like how its work,,,,any body know how this unlock 3g work??? please help me....Samsung Galaxy Tab 8.9 3G P7300 16GB Unlocked GSM Android Tablet (White)

Reviews.Title: dont buy at amazon deals
Reviews.Author: Almir A. F Jr.
Reviews.Content: im but the samsung tab 10.1 16gb 3g, but im receive the samsung tab 10.1 32gb without 3g. this store is bad......

Reviews.Title: Best Tablet Ever
Reviews.Author: raphael11cr
Reviews.Content: For me the best tablet in the market, can do everything and better than others, read the specs and compare, but for me is the best tablet.You must buy the HDTV, SD card and USB adapter to get a full functional tool.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Fahad
Reviews.Content: It is realy nice tablet but, there is some lag I hope the new upgrade (ICE CREAM SANDWICH) solve these problem.

Reviews.Title: Excelente Tablet
Reviews.Author: Rayih
Reviews.Content: Excelente articulo... Lo compre desde Venezuela y todo llego en perfectas condiciones... Recomiendo a amazon al 100%... En cuanto a la tablet pues es perfecta... Cumple con todo lo que puedan pedir...

Reviews.Title: Excelent hardware, but android is disappointing.
Reviews.Author: Alessandro
Reviews.Content: I have this pad for some time now.  The hardware is everything you would expect from it, beautiful design, battery is great, very light and thin.But when you read reviews comparing ipads and androids tablets, they dont tell you about how iOS is so much faster than android.  Everyone seems to love android, some say its even better than iOS because you can "personalize" it.Well, there arent many cool widgets in the market, you can get over a thousand clock widgets but still is just a clock in your screen.  Even thought this is the fastest hardware in the market, android looks like a windows vista running in a pentium 2 computer.Im not an apple fan, actually I hate mac, iphones or any apple product, but iPAD is by far the best tablet in the market yet.  I hope microsoft hurry with its windows 8 so we have a real fight.  Windows phone 7.5 is the best mobile OS, windows 8 might be as well for tablets.

Reviews.Title: Obsolete on day One
Reviews.Author: J. loeffler "mayor mccheese"
Reviews.Content: Dec - 2011I love this little thing, great screen, android interface is not as good as ipad, but it works.  Is not connection friendly - downloads on usb are limited by the Tabs speed.  16Gb will only let you store 4-5 movies unless you seriously downgrade them with your vid software before loading, which some may find okay.  However once you want to change content you either have to plugin and do it all again for 20 minutes or transfer it blue tooth which takes even longer, or pay for  an extra cable and carry around your videos on a separate USB stick.Not having an SD card slot ruined the great potential of this Tab.  Even with the 32Gb I will probaly have the same problem.  I run into the same same problem on the ipad.Next version needs an sd card.
